title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: The bug is related to the 'Close All Saved' functionality in build 20020508 with the latest UI code. There seems to be an issue where sometimes the 'Close All Saved' option does not work as expected.
OB: When the 'Close All Saved' option is selected from the file menu, not all the opened editors are being closed all the time.
EB: When the 'Close All Saved' option is selected from the file menu, all the opened editors should be closed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all opened editors.
3. Create a new file 'f1.txt'.
4. Open multiple files in different editors.
5. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
Expected result: All the opened editors should be closed.
